DataElement.preferredDefinition: A yes/no response to a question that asks whether the participant name matched the pathology report.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information pertaining to the participant's name matching the pathology report.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Someone who takes part in an activity.:Personal names, given or surname, as cultural characteristics, as ethnological or religious patterns, as indications of the geographic distribution of families and inbreeding, etc. Analysis of isonymy, the quality of having the same or similar names, is useful in the study of population genetics. NAMES is used also for the history of names or name changes of corporate bodies, such as medical societies, universities, hospitals, government agencies, etc.

Concepts.definition: Someone who takes part in an activity.

A word or group of words indicating the identity of a person usually consisting of a first (personal) name and a last (family) name with an optional middle name. In some cultural traditions the family name comes first.

Property.preferredDefinition: An exact duplicate; coinciding in characteristics; similar or consistent.:The description of cells and tissues made by a pathologist based on microscopic evidence, and sometimes used to make a diagnosis of a disease.

Concepts.definition: An exact duplicate; coinciding in characteristics; similar or consistent.

A report that provides a description of the gross and microscopic examination of the specimen and is used to make a diagnosis and to determine treatment. It defines which structures and organs of the body are involved by the tumor, verifies the primary site of the cancer and describes the extent to which it has spread.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the identification of patients' medical records and forms.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A choice of Yes and No answer.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

PermissibleValues.origin: OMB/NCI:Office of Management and Budget/National Cancer Institute

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

PermissibleValues.origin: OMB/NCI:Office of Management and Budget/National Cancer Institute

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: A Conceptual Domain to capture value meanings specfic to SPOREs not suitable for placement elsewhere.
ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: Changed name to match Context per Hvroje Med.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
